body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Noah James and I work for Car Excellence Dealership. How can I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Noah, my name is Rose Ross.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rose! To assist you better, can you provide me with your phone number and email address, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two three four, nine zero eight seven, and my email is roseross@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rose. I have noted down your contact information. Can you also confirm your address for us to proceed further with your concern about the returns?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is one two three Main Street, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming, Rose. We will look into your concern about the returns promptly. Is there anything else you would like to add or ask?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I think that covers it. Thank you for your assistance, Noah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Rose. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you need further assistance, feel free to contact us at any time. Have a great day!
